text: Pisarzowice () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kamienna Góra, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. == Gallery == File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Pisarzowice 09.jpg|Street File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Pisarzowice 15.jpg|Local industry File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Pisarzowice 18.jpg|House File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Pisarzowice 34.jpg|Shop File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Pisarzowice 41.jpg|House by raod ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Pisarzowice, Kamienna Góra County
